ingredients.ingredient: 18 fresh okra pods, sliced 1/3 inch thick
2 teaspoons kosher salt, or to taste
2 teaspoons black pepper, or to taste

cookingTips: Pat okra dry thoroughly to reduce sliminess during roasting
Use high heat for crispy texture rather than steaming
Stir halfway through for even browning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user overcome okra's slimy texture by explaining how high-heat roasting creates crispness.
